resources.string: Does make the Soundstage wider with newest DTS Surround Sound Technology, made by DTS Engineers and performed by PDesire
A SRS Re-callibration to output more bass from the Headphones
After Enabling and Rebooting your device, the Rage Mode re-callibrate the Meli Audio Engine to get 200% Engine power.
The Rage Mode will break some EQs (unsure which gets broken) and the Battery Drain could be possibly higher than normal
Performs the best of AM3D in one app, enhancements in many ways for Speaker, Headphones and Bluetooth
Highest Customize Abillity on Audio u ever can get

App Teacher: Abo Hani 
 
Inspiration: Kagamine Rin, Megpoid Gumi, Utsu-P, Megurine Luka, Hatsune Miku, Sony Corp. and Google Inc.
 
Mentor: Honaka Rie (jimRnor) 
 
And to: 
 
Team Project Desire, Team Harmonics Symphonium, RXS Moonbreakers, TPD Developer Promotion Project Group and XTREMEMusic Big Family Group
